title: OK Late night GD! I've a srs question for you peoples...
body:
I've got in my possession every final fantasy ever made.

But which should i play first? I've beaten everything 7 and up (except 13....fuck that). And I'm not playing FF1 first because... Just no. 

I'm putting this question in the very capable hands of GD and hoping for brilliant answers. Also, I'd like to know *why* you suggest the final fantasy you've decided on.
